directions: In a large stock pot combine tomatoes, water, soup mix, onion, green bell pepper and zucchini.  Season with oregano, garlic powder and salt.  Bring to a boil.
Using a saute pan brown ground beef and then add to stock pot.  Add macaroni and cook until noodles and zucchini are tender, approximately 10 to 15 minutes.
ingredients: 2 (1.25 ounce) packages beef with onion soup mix
title: Zucchini Tomato Soup I
